library(tidyverse)
library(rtweet)

## Data import

Collect tweets about Traditional Marketing

```{r}

traditionalmarketing_tweets<-search_tweets(
  q="traditionalmarketing",
  n=50,
  include_rts = FALSE,
  lang="en",
  retryonratelimit = TRUE
)

```

Cleaner version:

```{r}
#look at first 10 obs
traditionalmarketing_tweets%>%
  head(10)

#look at structure
traditionalmarketing_tweets%>%
  str()
  
traditionalmarketing_short<-traditionalmarketing_tweets %>%
  select(user_id , screen_name , created_at , text , favorite_count, retweet_count, urls_expanded_url, hashtags, mentions_screen_name, location)

traditionalmarketing_short%>%write_csv("traditionalmarketing_short_04_06_2022.csv")
traditionalmarketing_tweets<-read_csv("traditionalmarketing_short_04_06_22.csv")
